name: list_with_discount
attributes: # [doc = " ベース価格と割引率から最終価格を計算し、"]
# [doc = " listing_account に連続バイトで書き込む。"]
# [doc = " （owner チェックを行っていないため、攻撃者が他人の"]
# [doc = "  アカウントを指定して無断で出品できます）"]
body: let acct = & mut ctx . accounts . listing_account . to_account_info () ;
let mut data = acct . data . borrow_mut () ;
let final_price = base_price . saturating_mul ((100u64 - discount_pct as u64)) / 100u64 ;
let ts = Clock :: get () ? . unix_timestamp as u64 ;
seq . extend_from_slice (& ctx . accounts . seller . key () . to_bytes ()) ;
msg ! ("NFT {} listed by {}: base={} → final={} (discount={}%)" , acct . key () , ctx . accounts . seller . key () , base_price , final_price , discount_pct) ;

fields.name: listing_account
fields.attribute: # [doc = " CHECK: owner == program_id の検証を一切行っていない AccountInfo"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: seller
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 出品者の署名のみ検証"]
